definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: It's a tourist place of attraction.
Still the cultural center of Japan, Kyoto is an absolute must-see.
sentences.chinese: 仍然是日本文化中心的京都是一个必游的景点。

sentences.english: From the above question, why do you consider Antarctica as your tourist destination?
sentences.chinese: 承上题，为什么会考虑选择南极作为旅游景点？

sentences.english: Road map guide attractions and changes to extensions.
sentences.chinese: 导游图的景点和道路的修改扩充功能。

sentences.english: Some famous scenic spots in the world will disappear , do you kno…
sentences.chinese: 世界上有快要消失的著名景点，知道吗？

sentences.english: How else to explain those wacky, way-out-in-left-field roadside attractions you'll stumble upon?
sentences.chinese: 否则怎么解释你偶然遇到的出现在路左边的景点？

sentences.english: As for foreign visitors, appropriate translations of signs are of great significance.
sentences.chinese: 对于国外游客，景点牌示的恰当翻译十分重要。

sentences.english: Below I listed some best rewarding wow gold farming spots.
sentences.chinese: 下面我列出了一些最有价值的谢文东农业景点。

sentences.english: There are many beautiful views in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京有许多美丽的风景点。

sentences.english: I went to Tainan and enjoyed the attractions, then Lugang the historical town.
sentences.chinese: 我到了台南有名的景点，然后是具有历史意义的鹿港。

sentences.english: L'Hotel des Invalides is the first site I visited in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 荣军院是我第一个正式参观的巴黎景点。

sentences.english: Christina Sweet works at the Kam Wah Chung State Historic Site.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯蒂纳斯威特在州钟锦华历史景点工作。

sentences.english: A tourist attraction have any off-season and peak seasons.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个旅游景点都有淡季和旺季之分。

sentences.english: As the map indicates, the Lincoln Park is one of the scenic spots.
sentences.chinese: 按地图上所标明的，林肯公园是风景点之一。

sentences.english: Which Korean drama filming place is the place that you want to visit the most?
sentences.chinese: 以下那一韩剧中的景点是你最想去游览的呢？

sentences.english: Palau is noteworthy for its amazing and scuba diving sights.
sentences.chinese: 帛琉以其令人赞叹的浮潜和潜水景点著称。

definition: a place famous for its scenery or historical relics/scenic spot/CL:處|处[chu4]
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
places of historic interest/historical sites/CL:個|个[ge4]
